title: Inside Rihanna's star-studded Savage X Fenty show at New York Fashion Week
text:
NEW YORK – Is there anything Rihanna can't do? The answer continues to be a resounding "no" as she further solidifies herself as a multi-hyphenate star, returning to the stage Tuesday night to bring her inclusive lingerie brand Savage X Fenty back to New York Fashion Week with a fabulous show.

Rihanna transformed Brooklyn's Barclays Center into her own intimate world, complete with a Grecian-inspired set with white stairs and archways, and brought out some of the biggest stars to the audience and the stage for her second-ever Savage show.

Some of the industry's top models – Gigi and Bella Hadid, Cara Delevingne, Joan Smalls and Slick Woods – joined forces with model-dancers of all shapes, ethnicities and sizes and top-notch entertainers – including Migos, DJ Khaled, Halsey and Normani – to showcase a colorful variety of bras, underwear, bodysuits and sexy undergarments in the most entertaining way.

And the proof is in the performance: If there were any worries about how wearable the lingerie is, all the intense dance moves showed that everything stays right where it's supposed to be no matter how vigorous the movement.

As if the Victoria's Secret fashion show needed another kick while it's down, the Savage X Fenty show delivered a one-two punch of size inclusivity and diversity to the struggling lingerie brand as it continues to shutter stores and opts to "rethink" its own annual show.

The show, which fans can stream on Amazon Prime Video on Sept. 20, was equal parts runway event, concert and dance party. Here's everything you missed from the highly anticipated night:

Rihanna performed a sultry dance routine but didn't sing. More

Rihanna opened the show with a sultry dance performance

Rihanna stepped out to start the show, seductively dancing in the center, rocking a sheer black catsuit, tiny velvet mini skirt, a red lip and diamonds. Surrounded by a circle of dancers, the bass-heavy opener was met with applause and cheers from the crowd.

For fans hoping for a singing performance or a preview of a new song, the dance routine was all Rihanna provided. (We promise we're grateful, and we're not rushing you on the new music!)

Rihanna performs at the Savage X Fenty Show on Tuesday in Brooklyn, N.Y. More

She didn't return until her final bow at the end of the show, giving the camera and the audience a joyful wave before exiting the stage.

Forbes' list: Rihanna tops list of wealthiest female musicians with eye-popping $600 million

A-list celebrities from Diplo to Paris Hilton hit the red carpet

Rihanna called on all her famous friends to attend the show.

Halsey, Diplo and Normani made early entrances on the carpet. Rappers A$AP Ferg, Fat Joe, Big Sean, G-Eazy, A Boogie wit da Hoodie, Saweetie and Rico Nasty showed up and showed out. Actors Ashley Benson, Dascha Polanco, Naturi Naughton and Vanessa Hudgens also made appearances.
description: Rihanna brought out all the stops and the biggest stars for her inclusive Savage X Fenty lingerie show for New York Fashion Week.
